repnme.cdata!: Colombia - Power Sector Adjustment Loan Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Power Sector Adjustment Loan Project
            supports the continuation of the Government's reform
            program in the power sector. The principal objectives of the
            program are to improve the efficiency of power generation,
            transmission and distribution. Government policies are
            designed to: rationalize investments, bring electricity
            pricing in line with long-run marginal costs, finance a
            larger share of future investments from sector cash
            generation and thereby reduce pressure on other public
            sector investments, and improve the regulatory framework and
            utility management. The loan supports measures to achieve
            these objectives and assist in restructuring the finances of
            the sector. The Power Sector Adjustment Loan Project forms
            part of the package to help financing needs of Colombia for
            1987-90. Implementation of the Government's power
            sector adjustment program would result in several
            significant benefits to the economy.
